sensory_systems.name: Advanced Spectroscopic Dough Analysis
sensory_systems.description: A multi-spectral system using Raman and NIR spectroscopy to analyze dough composition in real-time. Detects hydration levels, gluten development, starch breakdown, and inclusion of ingredients with high precision.

sensory_systems.name: Olfactory Array for Aroma Profiling
sensory_systems.description: An array of micro-sensors (e.g., metal oxide sensors, resistive sensors) to continuously monitor the volatile aroma compounds being released during baking. Identifies key flavor precursors.

technical_specifications.sensor_type: Metal Oxide Array (MOS), potentially combined with electronic nose technology

sensory_systems.name: Visual Quality Assessment System
sensory_systems.description: High-resolution 3D camera system combined with image recognition AI to assess crust color, crumb structure, and overall appearance. Detects imperfections and deviations from target specifications.
sensory_systems.accuracy_metrics: Crust Color: ±0.1 ΔE (CIE color space), Crumb Structure: Automated analysis of pore size and shape – >90% correlation with manual assessment.

control_systems.name: Model Predictive Control (MPC) with Reinforcement Learning
control_systems.description: MPC system continuously optimizing baking parameters (temperature, humidity, mixing speed, proofing time) based on real-time sensor data and a predictive model of dough behavior. Uses reinforcement learning to adapt to variations in ingredient quality and oven performance.
control_systems.accuracy_metrics: Crust Color: ±0.05 ΔE, Crumb Texture: ±10% deviation from target

control_systems.name: Adaptive Mixing & Proofing System
control_systems.description: Precisely controlled mixers and proofing chambers with integrated sensors and feedback loops for maintaining optimal conditions throughout the process.

technical_specifications.proof_time_control: Automated based on dough pH and CO2 levels

mechanical_systems.accuracy_metrics: N/A (primarily relies on precision and control)

mechanical_systems.name: Automated Scoring & Branding System
mechanical_systems.description: Modular, robotic system capable of performing various scoring patterns and applying branding to loaves.

software_integration.name: Digital Twin of the Baking Process
software_integration.description: A virtual replica of the entire baking process, continuously updated with sensor data. Used for simulation, optimization, and predictive maintenance.

technical_specifications.simulation_fidelity: Physics-based model incorporating dough rheology, heat transfer, and chemical reactions.
